00166   class BasicClassPtr : public ClassPtr {
00167 
00168   public:
00169     BasicClassPtr(BasicClass *o = 0) : ClassPtr(o) { }
00170 
00171     BasicClass *getBasicClass() {return dynamic_cast<BasicClass *>(o);}

00173
